Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI gives feedback mostly on technical aspects such as grammar and word usage while teachers can also feedback on writing style and content.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: I do not trust every feedback from GenAI without my own judgement but I feel that teachers’ comments are more trustworthy.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: GenAI’s feedback is more monotonous while teachers can give feedback based on each individual assignment.
